title: HMSI total wholesales in May at 3,53,188 units
description: "The market is gaining back strength as disturbances in terms of supply side are subsiding coupled with rise in physical presence at office and educational institutions," HMSI Managing Director, President and CEO Atsushi Ogata said in a statement.
